channel.title: 3 Errors. (Help)
channel.description:
[code]src\server\model\players\packets\ClickingButtons.java:49: error: cannot find sym bol c.handleSumSpec(); ^ symbol: method handleSumSpec() location: variable c of type Client src\server\model\players\packets\ClickingButtons.java:54: error: cannot find sym bol if (c.hasFollower > 0) { ^ symbol: variable hasFollower location: variable c of type Client src\server\model\players\packets\ClickingButtons.java:58: error: cannot find sym bol if (c.hasFollower <= 0) { ^ symbol: variable hasFollower location: variable c of type Client Note: Some input files use unchecked or unsafe operations. Note: Recompile with -Xlint:unchecked for details. 3 errors Press any key to continue . . . }[/code]
Can you tell me how to fix this error? It had like 18 errors and i fixed them, but after i fixed them i got these 3 last error. I do understand i have to add method's into the client but i dont know where. I've only been coding for 3 month's.

item.title: 3 Errors. (Help)
item.dc:creator: @TheHolyGrail TheHolyGrail
item.description:
@TheHolyGrail wrote:

[quote=“All Time Low, post:7, topic:441467”]Think use one, their was one already on the source but it was commented out.[/quote]I don’t understant what you’re saying.

If you don’t know what the errors are for then simply add these into your Player.java

public int hasFollower = -1; public void handleSumSpec() { }Please note that whatever you were trying to add will not work, but it will fix those errors.

Read full topic

item.title: 3 Errors. (Help)
item.dc:creator: @TheHolyGrail TheHolyGrail
item.description:
@TheHolyGrail wrote:

With whatever tutorial you were doing you did not follow it correctly.

You are currently missing the hasFollower boolean and handleSumSpec() method in your Client.java/Player.java.

Read full topic
